description: When shooting with high ISO sensitivity, the product reduces noise that becomes more noticeable when the product sensitivity is high.

items.label: Normal
items.description: Activates high ISO noise reduction normally.

items.label: Low
items.description: Activates high ISO noise reduction moderately.

items.label: Off
items.description: Does not activate high ISO noise reduction.

note: [High ISO NR] is fixed to [Normal] in the following shooting modes: [Intelligent Auto]
